verses.verse: A <S%H7390>gentle<s%> <S%H4617>answer<s%> <S%H7725>turns<s%> away <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> but a <S%H6089>harsh<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> stirs <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H639>anger.<s%>
The <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3190>commends<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> but the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> gush <S%H5042>out<s%> <S%H200>folly.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H4725>everywhere,<s%> keeping <S%H6822>watch<s%> on the <S%H7451>evil<s%> and the <S%H2896>good.<s%>
A <S%H4832>gentle<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is a <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> but <S%H5558>deceit<s%> in it <S%H7667>crushes<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
A <S%H191>fool<s%> <S%H5006>despises<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4148>correction,<s%> but he who <S%H8104>heeds<s%> <S%H8433>reproof<s%> shows <S%H6191>prudence.<s%>
In the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H2633>treasure,<s%> but the <S%H8393>income<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> brings <S%H5916>trouble.<s%>
The <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2219>spread<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge;<s%> not so with the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
The <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> made by the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> but the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> is his <S%H7522>delight.<s%>
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> but he <S%H157>loves<s%> him who <S%H7291>follows<s%> after <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
There is <S%H7451>stern<s%> <S%H4148>discipline<s%> for one who <S%H5800>forsakes<s%> the <S%H734>way:<s%> whoever <S%H8130>hates<s%> <S%H8433>reproof<s%> shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>
<S%H7585>Sheol<s%> and <S%H11>Abaddon<s%> are before <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>â€” how much more then the <S%H3826>hearts<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>
A <S%H3887>scoffer<s%> <S%H157>doesn't<s%> love to be <S%H3198>reproved;<s%> he will not <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H2450>wise.<s%>
A <S%H8056>glad<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> makes a <S%H3190>cheerful<s%> <S%H6440>face;<s%> but an <S%H6094>aching<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5218>breaks<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of one who has <S%H995>understanding<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> but the <S%H6310>mouths<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> on <S%H200>folly.<s%>
All the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> are <S%H7451>wretched,<s%> but one who has a <S%H2896>cheerful<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> enjoys a <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H4960>feast.<s%>
<S%H2896>Better<s%> is <S%H4592>little,<s%> with the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> than <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H214>treasure<s%> with <S%H4103>trouble.<s%>
<S%H2896>Better<s%> is a <S%H737>dinner<s%> of <S%H3419>herbs,<s%> where <S%H160>love<s%> <S%H75>is,<s%> than a fattened <S%H7794>calf<s%> with <S%H8135>hatred.<s%>
A <S%H2534>wrathful<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> stirs <S%H1624>up<s%> <S%H4066>contention,<s%> but one who is <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%> appeases <S%H7379>strife.<s%>
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> is like a <S%H2312>thorn<s%> <S%H4881>patch,<s%> but the <S%H734>path<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> is a <S%H734>highway.<s%>
A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> makes a <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8055>glad,<s%> but a <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H959>despises<s%> his <S%H517>mother.<s%>
<S%H200>Folly<s%> is <S%H8057>joy<s%> to one who is <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>wisdom,<s%> but a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding<s%> keeps his <S%H3212>way<s%> <S%H3474>straight.<s%>
Where there is no <S%H5475>counsel,<s%> <S%H4284>plans<s%> <S%H6565>fail;<s%> but in a <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H3289>counselors<s%> they are <S%H6965>established.<s%>
<S%H8057>Joy<s%> comes to a <S%H376>man<s%> with the <S%H4617>reply<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> How <S%H2896>good<s%> is a <S%H1697>word<s%> at the right <S%H6256>time!<s%>
The <S%H734>path<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> leads <S%H4605>upward<s%> for the <S%H7919>wise,<s%> to <S%H5493>keep<s%> him from going <S%H4295>downward<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5255>uproot<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H1343>proud,<s%> but he will <S%H5324>keep<s%> the <S%H490>widow<s%>'s borders <S%H1366>intact.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8441>detests<s%> the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of the <S%H7451>wicked,<s%> but the <S%H561>thoughts<s%> of the <S%H2889>pure<s%> are <S%H5278>pleasing.<s%>
He who is <S%H1214>greedy<s%> for <S%H1215>gain<s%> <S%H5916>troubles<s%> his own <S%H1004>house,<s%> but he who <S%H8130>hates<s%> <S%H4979>bribes<s%> will <S%H2421>live.<s%>
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1897>weighs<s%> <S%H6030>answers,<s%> but the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5042>gushes<s%> out <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H7350>far<s%> from the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> but he <S%H8085>hears<s%> the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
The <S%H3974>light<s%> of the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H8055>rejoices<s%> the <S%H3820>heart.<s%> <S%H2896>Good<s%> <S%H8052>news<s%> <S%H1878>gives<s%> <S%H1878>health<s%> to the <S%H6106>bones.<s%>
The <S%H241>ear<s%> that <S%H8085>listens<s%> to <S%H8433>reproof<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> and will be at <S%H3885>home<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H2450>wise.<s%>

He who <S%H6544>refuses<s%> <S%H4148>correction<s%> <S%H3988>despises<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul,<s%> but he who <S%H8085>listens<s%> to <S%H8433>reproof<s%> <S%H7069>gets<s%> <S%H3820>understanding.<s%>
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H4148>teaches<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%> <S%H6440>Before<s%> <S%H3519>honor<s%> is <S%H6038>humility.<s%>
